name: Butterfingers
desc: Drop your weapon

name: Catch your breath
desc: You can only take a move action next round

name: Stuck
desc: Your weapon is stuck in a nearby surface. DC 20 Str check to free it

name: Backswing
desc: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

name: Slipped
desc: You are knocked prone

name: This sword is too heavy
desc: You are fatigued

name: Awkward Attack
desc: You take -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds

name: Overextend
desc: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents

name: Pulled Muscle
desc: You take 1d4 points of Str damage

name: Fling
desc: You drop your weapon and it lands 1d6 squares away in a random direction

name: Broken Blade
desc: Your weapon is destroyed (Ref Negates) Magic weapons use their own save bonus (DMG 214)

name: Notched
desc: Your weapon takes 1d6 points of damage, ignoring hardness

name: Parry! Dodge! Spin! Thrust!
desc: You are dazed for 1 round

name: Hand it over
desc: Your target gains possession of your weapon (Ref Negates)

name: Shield Crash
desc: Your attack deals damage to your shield

name: Winded
desc: You are exhausted (Fort negates)

name: Wide Open
desc: You are flat-footed for 1 round

name: Critical Mistake
desc: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

name: Strain
desc: You take 1d4 points of Dex damage

name: Too Much Stuff
desc: You become entangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself

name: Spinning Swing
desc: You are sickened for 1d4 rounds

name: I told you it was sharp
desc: You take 1d6 points of bleed

name: Pin Prick
desc: You take 1 point of bleed

name: Off Balance
desc: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round

name: Sorry
desc: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target

name: Bonk
desc: You are stunned for 1 round (Fort Negates)

name: Catastrophic Failure
desc: You fall unconscious for 1d6 rounds (Will negates)

name: Pointy End Goes There
desc: You take 1 point of Con damage

name: Broken Haft
desc: Your weapon loses reach. You have a -4 penalty on attack rolls with it until repaired (DC 20 Craft check)

name: Fog of War
desc: You threaten no square for 1d6 rounds

name: Go For The Eyes
desc: You are blinded for 1 round

name: Punt
desc: Your weapon flies 2d6 squares in a random direction

name: Bad Grip
desc: Your weapon deals nonlethal damage for the next 3 rounds

name: Who Was That
desc: You are dazed for 1d3 rounds

name: You Meant to do That
desc: Move 10 feet in a random direction and provoke attacks of opportunity as normal

name: Eat Dirt
desc: You fall prone and are blinded for 1d3 rounds (Fort Negates)

name: Second Thoughts
desc: You are sickened for 1d6 rounds

name: Attack the Darkness
desc: All your enemies have concealment from you for 1d4 rounds

name: Wait! What?
desc: You are confused for 1 round

name: Wrong End
desc: If you're using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 points of damage and 1 point of bleed

name: Vibration
desc: If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you take 1d3 of Str damage and drop your weapon

name: No Way
desc: Your attack hits the target, but deals minimum damage

name: Funny Bone
desc: You drop whatever is in your off hand

name: Bent
desc: You take -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until it is repaired (DC 20 Craft Check)

name: All or Nothing
desc: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit

name: Surrounded by Foes
desc: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

name: On the Receiving End
desc: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

name: Bohemian Earspoon
desc: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal Check)

name: Better to Give
desc: You attack damages you instead. Use your target's Str modifier

name: Cutter
desc: You take 1 point of Str bleed

name: This is Bad
desc: You take an amount of bleed equal to your Str bonus (minimum 1)

name: Armor Smash
desc: Your attack deals damage to your armor
